txt.en: 'Welcome back! I hope you did not suffer overly much in this task.'
Smothercap can be found in northern Clovengap.\n\nGolodhrim has asked you to destroy smothercap mushrooms.
Golodhril is located in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should tell Golodhril that you have removed many of the smothercap mushrooms.

'I would ask your help once more while I examine the plants you brought me. A scout returned recently with word of a strange mushroom that releases toxic fumes when one draws near.\n\n'From their description, this can be no other than smothercap. In small doses it… ah, never mind that. The fungus is deadly. When you are out in the frozen fields north of here, keep watch for the mushrooms, friend. Oh, and - I encourage you to destroy them from a distance.'
A deadly fungus spews poisons on the banks of the Kurdushâlak.
